author: Barry G
title: Excellent Room Excellent Service
text:
The room is well amenitied and the bed very comfortable. There are functional blackout drapes and nice linen plus toiletries. Of the 2 room types we liked the Park view because we could make it totally dark. The Hudson view has a larger bathroom. Both have stall showers plus tubs.
We found it convenient to have a shopping mall in the building when the weather was bad. There are also 4 restaurants in the mall so you have plenty to choose from. Across the street in the Trump International there is a 3 star Michelin restaurant. Lincoln Center is 3 blocks south and Carnegie Hall 5 blocks northeast. There was a taxi stand on Columbus Circle at the mall entrance so it was easy to get a cab. There is also a subway down stairs plus Central Park across the street.
